Attributes.description: Rhetorical purposes, moves and features of new media genres that use or transform research for public audiences. Provides opportunities for students to analyze, critically assess, and produce these genres themselves.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of ASTU 100, ASTU 101, WRDS 150, WRDS 350.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Tue Wed, Start Time: 11:00, End Time: 12:30, Building: Buchanan, Room: B307
